opencontract-activity.@generated-datetime: DateTime stamp of when document was created

meta.@last-updated-datetime: DateTime stamp of date this document was last updated.

opencontract-organization-id.@organization-type: Indicates whether organization is a contracting or supplier. Optional. In the meta data this should always be a contracting organization and in the award a supplier.
opencontract-organization-id.#text: Globally Unique Organization ID, based on existing identifiers, and linking to further details held in an opencontract-organisation record

meta.opencontract-organization-contact: Dictionary with same fields as 'opencontract-organization'.'contact' that can be used to override standard contact details.
meta.opencontract-id: ID to uniquely identify this contracting activity through the workflow from call -> award -> performance -> completion / termination - similar to IATI activity ID
meta.title: Short title of contract
meta.category: General category of contract - goods, services, etc. - by code list
meta.sector: General contract sector - by code list

line-item.id: ID used by contracting organziation to identify product or service.

performance-location.@encoding: Location maybe coded e.g. NUTS, zipcode or just plain text - use code list to identify the type of location
performance-location.#text: Primary location where goods or services are to be delivered.

meta.url: Link to bid / award / contract information online

bid.@last-updated-datetime: DateTime stamp of date this document was last updated.
bid.date-clarification: Date clarification enquiries must be submitted by.
bid.date-closing: Date when bids must be submit by.
bid.procuring-on-behalf: If the contracting organization is contracting on behalf of a third party.
bid.sme-friendly: Is the contract accessible to SMEs
bid.total-budget: The total amount budgeted for this contract.
bid.date-work-commence-scheduled: Date anticipated for start of work / delivery / performance phase
bid.date-work-end-scheduled: Date anticipated for end of work / delivery / performance phase

award.@last-updated-datetime: DateTime stamp of date this document was last updated.
award.selection-method: Method used to select contracted party.
award.total-award: The total amount awarded for this contract.

signatory-name: List of names of all contract signatories

opencontract-organization-id.@organization-type: Indicates whether organization is a contracting or supplier. Optional. In the meta data this should always be a contracting organization and in the award a supplier.
opencontract-organization-id.#text: Organization ID links record to organization in registry

recipient.opencontract-organization-contact: Dictionary with same fields as 'opencontract-organization'.'contact' that can be used to override standard contact details.

award.date-work-commence-agreed: Date agreed for start of work / delivery / performance phase
award.date-work-end-agreed: Date agreed for end of work / delivery / performance phase

performance.@last-updated-datetime: DateTime stamp of date this document was last updated.
performance.date-work-commence-actual: Actual date of start of work / delivery / performance phase
performance.date-work-end-actual: Actual date of end of work / delivery / performance phase

payment.ref: Machine-readable identification string for the payment.
payment.value: The amount of the contribution (or its value, if in kind).
payment.currency: An ISO 639 code for the original currency of the amount.
payment.date-value: The date that this value was set (to allow historical currency conversion).
payment.description: A human-readable description of the transaction.
payment.transaction-type: The type of the transaction (e.g. commitment, disbursement, expenditure, etc.).
payment.disbursement-channel: The channel through which the funds will flow for this transaction, from a code list.

work-item.ref: Machine-readable identification string for the work item.
work-item.description: A human-readable description of the delivered work item.
work-item.type-work-item: The type of work item e.g. delivered goods, report, service

work-item-line-items.quantity: Quantity of items delivered in work item

termination.@last-updated-datetime: DateTime stamp of date this document was last updated.
termination.termination-code: Code to describe the reason for contract terminating, normal or abnormal, from a code list.

document.url: The target URL of the external document, e.g. http://www.example.org/doc.html.
document.format: The MIME type of the external document, e.g. “application/pdf”. A partial list of MIME types appears at http://iatistandard.org/codelists/file_format
document.title: A short, human-readable title. May be repeated for different languages.
document.language: ISO 2 letter code specifying the language of text in this element.
document.category: A category into which this document falls, using the document category code list. Must be specified at least once, and may be repeated for multiple categories.
